TopicTitle: i need star trek online firends

Articles.Content: tell me your star trek online name

Um. Maybe you should try the holodeck? 8)

Sorry. I don\'t play the game. Never much a fan of star trek. Too much 'We cant apply phelbotinum to that!' 'F*** IT! WE\'LL DO IT LIVE!' *Applies phebotinum to the thing.* 'OH my God we\'re saved!'
